ComicInfo.Title: Of Course You Realize This Means War
ComicInfo.Summary: Of Course You Realize This Means War: The Hulk has been turned into the Horseman of War by Apocalypse and Absorbing Man and Juggernaut try to stop him. The Hulk finally comes to his senses when he hits Rick Jones and hurts him badly.
